Mekvahan is a network of technology-enabled car & bike service centres, offering a seamless service experience at the convenience of a tap Our vast network of Car & Bike Service Centres uses only OEM/OES spare parts and high-quality consumables which ensures, what goes into your vehicle is nothing but the best. India’s best automobile service venture that aims at providing its outstanding assistance & services to all the two- & four-wheeler vehicle owners. Sharing smile through vehicle caring as your vehicle deserves the best After you refer someone, you and the referee each will get a credit of Rs 100 & Rs.50 in your respective wallets (after both of you download the app) and an additional credit of Rs. 25 & Rs. 75 (after both of you complete the first service of minimum Rs. 500 ).
The referral reward-amount earned, for both the referrer and referee, is not refundable in case the customer cancels his/her service." The referral reward-amount earned, for both the referrer and referee, will be based on the ‘number of services\'. Max referral allowed is 20 per user. Company reserves the right to reject referral benefit to the customer.
